name: Will "Slap" Smith
description:
I think we all know the story behind this

Disclaimer:
While characters in this game may resemble real people. This is the work of fiction and as such in no way represents the actual people this project was inspired by. All content in this project is purely satire as well as parody and is not intended to offend anyone.
